paragraph.heading: 1Configuring a Project
paragraph.paragraph:
The ability to configure a Project avoids the need for multiple Projects for different situations. For example, you may configure debug and release properties for a single Project, one designed to facilitate ease of development, and the other to facilitate speed and correctness. Project Properties for an ENViSioN! Project are performed through the
./10_Project_Property_Pages/ProjectConfiguration.xml Project Property Pages .
